body.content:
Beloved,Glory to God,hear the word of God.JESUS CHRST speaking.Those who eat MY flash and drink MY BLOOD live in me and I live in them.The living Father sent ME and because of Him I also live.In the same way whoever eats ME will live because of ME.(read-Jn-6-56-57..Acts-4-12..Jn-3-5-18)You are a unique human being.There never nas been anyone exactly like you, and there never will be.As far as God is concerned,you are unique.one of a kind.You can nerver be replaced.you are not expendable....It doesn´t matter what kind of life you have lived or how deep in hell you may be.Jesue Christ has already died for you.As far as God is concerned your fate has already been decided.The Bible says that God reconciled us to Himself through the blood of Jesus Christ.His Son.Now it is up to us to reconcile ourselves to Him,because He has already reconciled Himeslf to us.(read-2-Corth-5-17-20).God is not willing to do without any person.You are the only person who has the authority to give yourself to JESUS.Only you can make that decision.It is an honor to Jesus for us to do that.He has promised that when we honor Him.He will honor us.Jesus Christ loves you. ........Give careful thought to your ways.One singer was interviewed she said,"As a race we feel empty.This is because our spirituality has been wiped out and we don´t know how to express ourselves.As a result we are encouraged to fill that gap with alcohol,drugs,sex,or money.people out there are screaming for the truth. "see the satan´s encouragment alcohol,drugs,sex,or money".JESUS is calling you to day.God transferred our wrongdoing onto JESUS CHRIST HE IS THE TRUTH,He will fill the gap with Holy Spirit.(read-John-8-12,Matt-11-28-30,Acts-22-16) "Life without a relationship with God through Jesus Christ is like a television without the antenna" .How do you react to this statement? why?............................Beloved,GLORY TO GOD,hear the word of God.Christ Jesus speaking,it is truth that will sets you free.until you access the truth you will remain in bondage.What do you want to hear ?Do you crave for patronising message or do you want to hear the truth?.Are you where you are because of what you want to hear or because what God wants you to hear?(Jn-8-32)King Nebuchadnezzar.God warn him through disturbing dream.He got its meaning and was advised on how to prevent it,but he did nothing about it for one whole year.He was shown the problem and given solution,yet for so long he did nothing about it until the judgment come upon him.The seven years of madness could have been averted.JESUS speaking,the thief(satan) comes only in order to steal,kill,and destroy.I have come in order that you might have life-eternal.Is ur life saved IN CHRIST JESUS?(read-Jn-10-10(read-Heb-2-3,Acts-4-12,Dan-4-19-27)In what areas are you resisting God´s word TODAY?.......TESTIMONY.....TIME......There was a young man who had converted from islam to Christianity,this man did not only become converted but become a zealous Christian.He want about preaching Jesus as Lord,his father become ashamed.He called other muslam leaders to help him kill his son.But one of them said killing him will not solve the problem,let prepare a charm that will make him mad so people will see his conversion as beginning of madness.They made the charm as agreed and told the man´s father how to use it,the man shouted the name of Jesus when his father try him with his charm he fell with his charm.Today that man is an evengelist for Christ Jesus.Do u want to BE AN OVERCOMER IN LIFE??.TESTIMONY.....TIME..This is refreshing, someone said,I am going to school and my professor said concerning the Bible.If you can´t understand it and reason it out,forget it.Can you understand and reason out God? Well then,forget Him,according to this professor´s?ADVICE.Can you understand and reason out with your little peanut brain CHRIST JESUS Son of God?(Jn-3-16-18)The virgin birth?..This professor had said the virgin is not reasonable.It didn´t happen.Can you understand and reason out Holy Spirit?Can you understand and reason out divine healing.(Mark-5-26-30)Can you reason out this..Christ Jesus speaking I am the resurrection and the life.(Jn-11-25)No. Just believe in HIM you have eternal life.You can be a PH.D and be totally ignorant,while someone else who is completely illiterate can be wise.I realized that worldly academic education does not prepare us for life,nor advance us in our personhood.The standards of this world are not always an indication of our real true worth....Christ Jesus is the wisdom and power of God...For it is written I will destroy the wisdom of the wise,the inteligence of the inteligent I will furstrate.(read-1-corth-1-18-23)Take advantage of GOD´S OFFER of salvation in Christ Jesus.Have you ever asked Jesus to come in to your life?or you are not sure you are save if your answer is no.Pray this prayer with sincerity and confidence.LORD JESUS,I come to you today.I am a sinner,I can NOT help myself,forgive me my sins.cleanse me with your blood,deliver me From sin and satan,to serve the living GOD.today,LORD I accept you as my LORD,And my personal savior.thank you JESUS,for saving me.There is joy in heaven over the repentance of one sinner.(read- luke-15-7-10..Rom-10-9-17)There is no repentance in the grave.Your eternity with Christ Jesus is our concern.For more help ask Holy Spirit to lead you to any Bible church close to you.CHRIST´s return is imminent; Reject 666 Revelation 13:8-18: 9"He who has an ear, let him hear.please reply or sms  +22891278809 . I would like to pray with you and be your friend.GLORY TO JESUS CHRIST AMEN..
 
 
 
 
 

++++++++++++
